name: bootstrap-pretty
description: Pretty and flexible themes for Bootstrap 5.
author: Bootstrap Pretty (https://bootstrappretty.dev)

scripts.bundle: echo "ðŸš€ Cleaning dist folder..." && del-cli --force ./dist && echo "ðŸš€ Generating minified JS and CSS..." && (sass --load-path=node_modules --style=compressed --no-source-map ./scss/vscode:./dist/css & rollup --config) && echo "ðŸš€ Updating file names..." && node ./bundle.js && echo "ðŸš€ Generating unminified CSS..." && sass --load-path=node_modules --no-source-map ./scss/vscode:./dist/css && echo "âœ¨ Bundling complete!"
